entry.title: WIND WARNING , Stephenville
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:20 PM NST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -3.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Stephenville Airport 3:30 PM NST Sunday 19 February 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -3.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.3 kPa rising
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 78 %
Wind Chill: -9
Dewpoint: -6.4°C
Wind: W 19 km/h gust 36 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday night: Flurries. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Flurries ending this evening then partly cloudy. Local blowing snow early this evening. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near midnight. Wind becoming southeast 20 before morning. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Flurries. High plus 5.
entry.summary: Cloudy. A few flurries beginning in the morning then changing to rain at times heavy in the afternoon. Local snowfall amount 2 cm. Rainfall amount 10 mm. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming south 50 gusting to 70 except gusting to 100 along parts of the coast in the afternoon. High plus 5. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Rain at times heavy. Low zero.
entry.summary: Rain at times heavy ending overnight then cloudy. Fog patches developing in the evening. Amount 10 to 15 mm except 30 mm inland and over higher terrain. Wind south 50 km/h gusting to 70 except gusting to 100 along parts of the coast early in the evening. Wind becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 near midnight. Low zero. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.summary: Flurries. High plus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Sunday 19 February 2023
